attributes.action: Don't consider 2nd EU referendum. Invoke Article 50 for Leave proceedings soon
attributes.additional_details: Politicians and other members of the public should respect the will of the 17,410,742 people and allow us to leave now, and a second referendum should not be on the cards when a "decision of a generation" has been made. The EU leaders want us to begin proceedings soon, and therefore it would be a ridiculous breach of judgement to even consider another referendum, which would divide Britain further and cause more strain and uncertainty.  I am a young person and I believe this country must unite together: Remain, Leave and undecided voters of all backgrounds and beliefs for the future.
attributes.background: On Thursday, 23rd June, the people of the United Kingdom spoke their views in a tough and divided referendum. However, the British people chose to leave the European Union by 51.9%, and so this decision should be carried out without change.
